abstract.text: Exchange data with Final Cut Pro, and create effects plug-ins for Final Cut Pro and Motion.
Defines the methods provided by the host application to create parameters.
Creates an angle slider parameter and adds it to the plug-inâ€™s parameter list.

Creates a parameter for choosing an image mask path.
Creates a percentage floating point slider parameter and adds it to the plug-inâ€™s parameter list.  A parameter value of 1.0 corresponds to a slider value of 100%.

These constants specify the characteristics of parameters display.
A static, plain-text Unicode string object which you use when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
A value type whose instances are either `true` or `false`.
A 32-bit signed integer value type.
A 32-bit unsigned integer value type.
